gw.plugin.spm.impl

Class ABContactScoringPlugin

  • gw.plugin.spm.impl.ABContactScoringPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IABContactScoringPlugin, _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

    public class ABContactScoringPlugin
implements IABContactScoringPlugin, _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject
    The ContactManager plugin gw.plugin.spm.impl.ABContactScoringPlugin implements the interface IABContactScoringPlugin.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

        IntrinsicType

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ABContactScoringPlugin()

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Iterator<Key> findContactsToScore()
      This method finds the set of ABContacts to be scored for the ABContactScoring work queue writer. It is called by the writer and should never be called by the user. You can reimplement this method to change how scoring works. The method is useful if, in your scoring system, some ABContact entities need to be rescored without having received new reviews. For example, you want to weight scores by recency of reviews or if you want to cancel scores that are based on old reviews.
      Integer scoreABContact(ABContact contact)
      This method calculates the average score and average category scores for a given ABContact. It returns the overall review score. It is called either by ClaimCenter scripting through the ContactReviewPlugin and the IReviewSummaryAPI or by the ABContactScoring work queue worker. You can implement a different version of this method to change how scoring works. For example, you might want to weight scores in some manner.
      Note: The method sets the CategoryScores as a side effect, but returns the overall score.

      • Methods inherited from class gw.plugin.contact.IABContactScoringPlugin

        findContactsToScore, scoreABContact

      • Methods inherited from class _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

    • Method Detail

      • findContactsToScore

        Iterator<Key> findContactsToScore()
        This method finds the set of ABContacts to be scored for the ABContactScoring work queue writer. It is called by the writer and should never be called by the user. You can reimplement this method to change how scoring works. The method is useful if, in your scoring system, some ABContact entities need to be rescored without having received new reviews. For example, you want to weight scores by recency of reviews or if you want to cancel scores that are based on old reviews.
        Returns:
        an iterator over the entity Keys to be scored

      • scoreABContact

        Integer scoreABContact(ABContact contact)
        This method calculates the average score and average category scores for a given ABContact. It returns the overall review score. It is called either by ClaimCenter scripting through the ContactReviewPlugin and the IReviewSummaryAPI or by the ABContactScoring work queue worker. You can implement a different version of this method to change how scoring works. For example, you might want to weight scores in some manner.
        Note: The method sets the CategoryScores as a side effect, but returns the overall score.
        Parameters:
        contact - The ABContact to calculate the overall review score for.
        Returns:
        the overall review score for the given ABContact
